segments.content: This week, I'm excited to introduce 2 new contributors to help me with the newsletter!
segments.sourceMdx: This week, I'm excited to introduce 2 new contributors to help me with the newsletter!
segments.translated_content: 本周很高兴地宣布，有两位新贡献者加入协助编写这份周刊！

segments.content: **Tomasz and Kacper from [Software Mansion](https://swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here – you may already know us from libraries like Reanimated or Gesture Handler. We're happy to be among the authors of the This Week in React newsletter!
segments.sourceMdx: **Tomasz and Kacper from [Software Mansion](https://swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here – you may already know us from libraries like Reanimated or Gesture Handler. We're happy to be among the authors of the This Week in React newsletter!
segments.translated_content: **来自[Software Mansion](https://swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)的Tomasz和Kacper**——你们可能早已通过Reanimated或Gesture Handler等库认识我们。很荣幸能成为《This Week in React》的撰稿人之一！

segments.content: We were about to call it a fairly calm week… until React Conf 2025 was officially announced and React Native 0.79 dropped with Swift-compatible native modules for iOS, faster app startup on Android, and many more. Let's dive in!
segments.sourceMdx: We were about to call it a fairly calm week… until React Conf 2025 was officially announced and React Native 0.79 dropped with Swift-compatible native modules for iOS, faster app startup on Android, and many more. Let's dive in!
segments.translated_content: 我们原以为这是相当平静的一周……直到React Conf 2025官宣举办，以及React Native 0.79发布——该版本为iOS带来Swift兼容的原生模块、提升Android应用启动速度等多项改进。让我们深入看看吧！

segments.content: [![React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](/emails/issues/229/marmelab.jpg)](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)
segments.sourceMdx: [![React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](/emails/issues/229/marmelab.jpg)](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)
segments.translated_content: [![React-admin: 是的，你可以自己造轮子…但何必呢？](/emails/issues/229/marmelab.jpg)](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)

segments.content: **[React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[React-admin: Yes, You Could Build It Yourself… But Why?](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)**
segments.translated_content: **[React-admin: 是的，你可以自己造轮子…但何必呢？](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)**

segments.content: You didn’t spend years mastering React just to build CRUD apps on repeat. Yet here you are—facing another request for an admin panel and questioning your life choices.
segments.sourceMdx: You didn’t spend years mastering React just to build CRUD apps on repeat. Yet here you are—facing another request for an admin panel and questioning your life choices.
segments.translated_content: 你花费数年精通React，可不是为了反复构建CRUD应用。但此刻——面对又一个管理后台的需求，你开始怀疑人生。

segments.content: We've been there ourselves. That’s why we built [**react-admin**](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)—an open-source framework that handles the boring parts (data fetching, forms, auth, permissions…) so you can focus on the real dev work.
segments.sourceMdx: We've been there ourselves. That’s why we built [**react-admin**](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)—an open-source framework that handles the boring parts (data fetching, forms, auth, permissions…) so you can focus on the real dev work.
segments.translated_content: 我们感同身受。正因如此，我们打造了[**react-admin**](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/)——这个开源框架处理了枯燥的部分（数据获取、表单、鉴权、权限控制…），让你专注真正的开发工作。

segments.content: Powered by **Material UI, react-hook-form, react-router, react-query, and TypeScript**, it lets you build admins on top of any REST/GraphQL API—fast.
segments.sourceMdx: Powered by **Material UI, react-hook-form, react-router, react-query, and TypeScript**, it lets you build admins on top of any REST/GraphQL API—fast.
segments.translated_content: 基于**Material UI、react-hook-form、react-router、react-query和TypeScript**构建，它能让你在任何REST/GraphQL API上快速搭建管理后台。

segments.content: So next time your PM asks for a new dashboard, skip the existential crisis. [Just use react-admin.](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin)
segments.sourceMdx: So next time your PM asks for a new dashboard, skip the existential crisis. [Just use react-admin.](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin)
segments.translated_content: 当下次产品经理要求新仪表盘时，跳过存在主义危机。[直接用react-admin吧。](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin)

segments.content: The React conference is happening on October 7-8, 2025 in Henderson, Nevada, 🇺🇸 US. It’s where the React & React Native team shares official announcements live.
segments.sourceMdx: The React conference is happening on October 7-8, 2025 in Henderson, Nevada, 🇺🇸 US. It’s where the React & React Native team shares official announcements live.
segments.translated_content: 这场React大会将于2025年10月7-8日在美国内华达州亨德森市举办。React和React Native团队将在此现场发布官方公告。

segments.content: The only way to attend the conference in person is to win a ticket lottery that lets you purchase up to 2 tickets. Fortunately, if you’re not one of the lucky ones, the event will be livestreamed for free.
segments.sourceMdx: The only way to attend the conference in person is to win a ticket lottery that lets you purchase up to 2 tickets. Fortunately, if you’re not one of the lucky ones, the event will be livestreamed for free.
segments.translated_content: 唯一现场参会的方式是赢得门票抽签资格（中签者可购买最多2张门票）。不过若未中签也别担心，大会将提供免费线上直播。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Product for Engineers - Good taste makes great products: Simple design principles every engineer should know](https://go.posthog.com/twir-apr9)
* 📣 [The Future of Redwood Launches Today](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/the-future-of-redwood-launches-today/7938): The former project gets renamed to Redwood GraphQL and enters maintenance mode. [RedwoodSDK](https://redwoodjs.com/) is the new path for the framework under new leadership.
* 💬 [Next.js RFC – Deployment Adapters API](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/77740): Vercel plans to support adapters to deploy Next.js to any hosting provider.
* 🐦 [Tanner Linsley – TanStack Router \`intent\` preloading will predict where your users cursor will go](https://x.com/tannerlinsley/status/1908723776650355111)
* 🔐 [React Router and the Remix’ed path](https://zhero-web-sec.github.io/research-and-things/react-router-and-the-remixed-path): Vulnerability discovered affecting both React Router and Remix, a flaw for a potential DoS attack through cache poisoning.
* 📜 [React for Two Computers](https://overreacted.io/react-for-two-computers/): Dan Abramov expands on his React Conf talk with fresh insights to help you build a solid mental model of React Server Components and their origins.
* 📜 [Advanced React in the Wild](https://largeapps.dev/case-studies/advanced/): A great case study outlining 5 companies that have significantly improved the performance metrics of their React & Next.js sites and how they did it.
* 📜 [React & live streaming: How to include video mixing in your app](https://blog.swmansion.com/react-live-streaming-how-to-include-video-mixing-in-your-app-c460e09da7a8). A short tutorial explaining how to mix live video with React syntax and stream the output directly from the browser.
* 📜 [Why We Moved off Next.js](https://documenso.com/blog/why-we-moved-off-next-js): Quick feedback from the Documenso project, moving from Next.js App Router to Vite and React Router.
* 📜 [React.memo Demystified: When It Helps and When It Hurts](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-memo-when-it-helps-when-it-hurts): A concise explanation of common misconceptions and hidden pitfalls of memoization.
* 📜 [React Reconciliation: The Hidden Engine Behind Your Components](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-reconciliation-deep-dive/): Practical guidelines and clean architecture tips to ensure best performance with React reconciler
* 📜 [Why you need a custom context provider](https://gabrielpichot.fr/blog/why-you-need-a-custom-context-provider/): A nice interactive article that shows creating a custom Context Provider wrapper component can reduce un-necessary re-renders.
* 💸 [Supabase breaks the norms of traditional software architecture. Learn how.](https://go.clerk.com/pkKoKSg)
* 📦 [React Router 7.5 – new `route.lazy` API](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v750): Allows for more granular lazy loading.
* 📦 [Cloudflare Vite Plugin 1.0](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-the-cloudflare-vite-plugin/): Brings official support for React Router v7. Leverages Vite v6 Environment API so that your local dev server matches the production Cloudflare Workers runtime.
* 📦 [Fastify React 1.0](https://github.com/fastify/fastify-vite/releases/tag/react-v1.0.0): This new package might help you assemble your custom React meta-framework based on the Fastify web server and Vite (creating your own “Mini Next.js”). It supports React 19, and RSCs will come later. See also the related launch post ([React Server Confusion](https://hire.jonasgalvez.com.br/2025/apr/8/react-server-confusion/)) which also gives a good overview of the state of RSC support outside Webpack.
* 📦 [Apollo Client Next.js integration](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/apollo-client-integration-nextjs-officially-released): The experimental GraphQL client integration package is now officially stable, including a new implementation for `PreloadQuery` to help you avoid request waterfalls. Apollo Client v4 is now in alpha, and integration packages for React Router / TanStack Start being worked on.
* 📦 [Waku 0.22 – Announcing API routes](https://waku.gg/blog/api-routes)
* 📦 [Astro 5.6 – Global `astro:env` and experimental sessions on Cloudflare, experimental cookie-less sessions](https://astro.build/blog/astro-560/)
* 📦 [Hydrogen – March 2025 release – Support for Vite 6, turn on Remix `v3_routeConfig` flag 6](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/update/march-2025)
* 🎥 [Theo – A breakdown of style solutions for 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lIUp8bdKiq4)
* 🎥 [Youssef Benlemlih – The Magic Of Compound Components in React](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSM2MpJIwFg)

- 📦 [Cloudflare Vite Plugin 1.0](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-the-cloudflare-vite-plugin/): Brings official support for React Router v7. Leverages Vite v6 Environment API so that your local dev server matches the production Cloudflare Workers runtime.
- 📦 [Fastify React 1.0](https://github.com/fastify/fastify-vite/releases/tag/react-v1.0.0): This new package might help you assemble your custom React meta-framework based on the Fastify web server and Vite (creating your own “Mini Next.js”). It supports React 19, and RSCs will come later. See also the related launch post ([React Server Confusion](https://hire.jonasgalvez.com.br/2025/apr/8/react-server-confusion/)) which also gives a good overview of the state of RSC support outside Webpack.

Apollo Client v4 is now in alpha, and integration packages for React Router / TanStack Start being worked on.
- 📦 [Waku 0.22 – Announcing API routes](https://waku.gg/blog/api-routes)

- 🎥 [Youssef Benlemlih – The Magic Of Compound Components in React](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSM2MpJIwFg)
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [工程师的产品思维 - 好品味成就伟大产品：每位工程师都应了解的简约设计原则](https://go.posthog.com/twir-apr9)
- 📣 [红木框架的未来今日启航](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/the-future-of-redwood-launches-today/7938)：原项目更名为Redwood GraphQL进入维护模式，[RedwoodSDK](https://redwoodjs.com/)将成为新领导团队主导的开发方向。
- 💬 [Next.js RFC - 部署适配器API](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/77740)：Vercel计划通过适配器支持将Next.js部署至任意托管平台。
- 🐦 [Tanner Linsley - TanStack路由的`intent`预加载能预测用户光标移动方向](https://x.com/tannerlinsley/status/1908723776650355111)
- 🔐 [React Router与Remix改造之路的安全隐患](https://zhero-web-sec.github.io/research-and-things/react-router-and-the-remixed-path)：发现同时影响React Router和Remix的漏洞，可能通过缓存投毒导致拒绝服务攻击。
- 📜 [面向双端计算的React](https://overreacted.io/react-for-two-computers/)：Dan Abramov延展其React Conf演讲内容，深入解析React服务端组件的设计思想与演进历程。
- 📜 [实战中的高级React技巧](https://largeapps.dev/case-studies/advanced/)：案例研究展示5家企业如何显著提升React & Next.js站点的性能指标。
- 📜 [React与直播流媒体：如何在应用中集成视频混流](https://blog.swmansion.com/react-live-streaming-how-to-include-video-mixing-in-your-app-c460e09da7a8)：教程演示如何用React语法混流直播视频并从浏览器直接输出。
- 📜 [我们为何放弃Next.js](https://documenso.com/blog/why-we-moved-off-next-js)：Documenso项目从Next.js应用路由迁移至Vite+React Router的实践总结。
- 📜 [React.memo解密：何时有效何时有害](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-memo-when-it-helps-when-it-hurts)：剖析记忆化常见误区与潜在陷阱。
- 📜 [React协调机制：组件背后的隐形引擎](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/react-reconciliation-deep-dive/)：通过架构设计优化React协调器性能的实践指南。
- 📜 [自定义Context Provider的必要性](https://gabrielpichot.fr/blog/why-you-need-a-custom-context-provider/)：交互式文章演示如何通过封装Context Provider减少不必要渲染。
- 💸 [Supabase如何打破传统软件架构范式](https://go.clerk.com/pkKoKSg)
- 📦 [React Router 7.5 - 新增`route.lazy`API](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v750)：支持更细粒度的懒加载。
- 📦 [Cloudflare Vite插件1.0](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-the-cloudflare-vite-plugin/)：正式支持React Router v7，利用Vite v6环境API使本地开发环境匹配Cloudflare Workers生产环境。
- 📦 [Fastify React 1.0](https://github.com/fastify/fastify-vite/releases/tag/react-v1.0.0)：基于Fastify和Vite构建自定义React元框架（打造"迷你Next.js"），支持React 19，服务端组件功能后续推出。相关文章[《React服务端组件的困惑》](https://hire.jonasgalvez.com.br/2025/apr/8/react-server-confusion/)对非Webpack环境的RSC支持现状做了清晰梳理。
- 📦 [Apollo Client Next.js集成方案](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/apollo-client-integration-nextjs-officially-released)：实验性GraphQL客户端集成包进入稳定阶段，新增`PreloadQuery`实现避免请求瀑布流。Apollo Client v4进入alpha阶段，正在开发React Router/TanStack集成包。
- 📦 [Waku 0.22 - 新增API路由功能](https://waku.gg/blog/api-routes)
- 📦 [Astro 5.6 - 全局`astro:env`变量、Cloudflare实验性会话功能及无cookie会话实验](https://astro.build/blog/astro-560/)
- 📦 [Hydrogen 2025年3月更新 - 支持Vite 6，启用Remix `v3_routeConfig`标志](https://hydrogen.shopify.dev/update/march-2025)
- 🎥 [Theo - 2025年样式方案全景解析](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lIUp8bdKiq4)
- 🎥 [Youssef Benlemlih - React复合组件的魔法](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WSM2MpJIwFg)

segments.content: With Microsoft AppCenter shutdown, choose the reliable and robust alternative that doesn't compromise on security, privacy or performance.
segments.sourceMdx: With Microsoft AppCenter shutdown, choose the reliable and robust alternative that doesn't compromise on security, privacy or performance.
segments.translated_content: 随着微软AppCenter停服，选择这款在安全性、隐私性和性能上毫不妥协的可靠替代方案。

segments.content:
* ✅ Seamless transition: One-command migration from AppCenter
* ✅ Enterprise-grade security: Code signing, SAML SSO, IP allowlisting and more
* ✅ Performance at scale: High-availability architecture with fast global CDN
* ✅ Privacy-first approach: EU-based infrastructure with built-in GDPR compliance features
* ✅ Dedicated support: Priority handling and satisfied customers
segments.sourceMdx:
- ✅ Seamless transition: One-command migration from AppCenter
- ✅ Enterprise-grade security: Code signing, SAML SSO, IP allowlisting and more
- ✅ Performance at scale: High-availability architecture with fast global CDN
- ✅ Privacy-first approach: EU-based infrastructure with built-in GDPR compliance features
- ✅ Dedicated support: Priority handling and satisfied customers
segments.translated_content:
- ✅ 无缝迁移：单命令从AppCenter迁移
- ✅ 企业级安全：代码签名、SAML单点登录、IP白名单等功能
- ✅ 大规模性能：高可用架构与全球CDN加速
- ✅ 隐私优先：基于欧盟基础设施的内置GDPR合规特性
- ✅ 专属支持：优先处理机制与客户满意度保障

segments.content: Our platform is built by developers managing high-traffic applications who understand what's at stake when pushing critical updates.
segments.sourceMdx: Our platform is built by developers managing high-traffic applications who understand what's at stake when pushing critical updates.
segments.translated_content: 我们的平台由管理高流量应用的开发者构建，深谙关键更新的重要性。
**[React Native 0.79 – 更快的工具链及其他改进](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2025/04/08/react-native-0.79)**

segments.content: Recently, the React Native core team switched to more frequent release cycles, so this is a smaller release, but nonetheless exciting in terms of performance improvements. Here are the highlights:
segments.sourceMdx: Recently, the React Native core team switched to more frequent release cycles, so this is a smaller release, but nonetheless exciting in terms of performance improvements. Here are the highlights:
segments.translated_content: 近期React Native核心团队转向更频繁的发布周期，虽然本次更新规模较小，但在性能提升方面仍值得关注。亮点包括：

segments.content:
* Metro: 3x faster cold startup and package exports support
* JavaScriptCore (JSC) moving to a Community Package
* iOS: Swift-Compatible Native Modules registration
* Android: Faster app startup thanks to skipping the JS bundle compression
* Removal of Remote JS Debugging
segments.sourceMdx:
- Metro: 3x faster cold startup and package exports support
- JavaScriptCore (JSC) moving to a Community Package
- iOS: Swift-Compatible Native Modules registration
- Android: Faster app startup thanks to skipping the JS bundle compression
- Removal of Remote JS Debugging
segments.translated_content:
- Metro：冷启动速度提升3倍并支持包导出
- JavaScriptCore (JSC) 转为社区维护包
- iOS：支持Swift兼容的原生模块注册
- Android：通过跳过JS包压缩实现更快应用启动
- 移除远程JS调试功能

segments.content:
* 💸 [Radon IDE – More than 20,000 engineers have already chosen it for a smoother, all-in-one development experience. It's your turn.](https://ide.swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
* 👀 [Expo – React 19.1 `captureOwnerStack` will enable improved error messages](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/35866#issuecomment-2789891297)
* 💬 [React Native RFC – Removing deep imports from react-native](https://github.com/huntie/react-native-discussions-and-proposals/blob/proposal-deprecate-subpath-imports/proposals/0894-deprecate-subpath-imports.md): This change allows to define what functions are exported from packages shrinking the API surface area. The goal is to provide a more stable API throughout the ecosystem.
* 🐦 [Ben Awad – describes his journey to reduce Application Not Responding (ANR) errors on Android](https://x.com/benawad/status/1908860185113665889)
* ☂️ [Help React Native core team Kotlin-ify React Native tests](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/50513): Great way to start contributing to an open source project.
* 📅 [React Native London Meetup – April 17th, 2025](https://guild.host/events/react-native-london-e0q1f1)
* 📜 [Understanding and comparing fingerprints in Expo apps](https://expo.dev/blog/understanding-and-comparing-fingerprints-in-expo-apps): Using hashes to compare whether there was a change in a native build of a React Native & Expo app.
* 📜 [Cut CI from 20 minutes to 6 with EAS Workflows and EAS Updates](https://shift.infinite.red/cut-ci-from-20-minutes-to-6-with-eas-workflows-and-eas-updates-8d928fe5dcfc): Infinite Red shows how they improved their CI time by fingerprinting native builds.
* 📜 [Playing Audio in React Native with react-native-track-player](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-04-04/playing-audio-in-react-native/)
* 📜 [Vercel & React Native – A New Era of Mobile Development?](https://www.thisdot.co/blog/vercel-and-react-native-a-new-era-of-mobile-development): Speculation on what steps Vercel might take in the React Native space.
* 📜 [A Guide to Logging in React Native](https://blog.sentry.io/a-guide-to-logging-in-react-native/): Including console, native and system logs.
* 📦 [Builder Bob 0.40](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-builder-bob/releases/tag/react-native-builder-bob%400.40.0)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm – The ultimate way to build apps in 2025](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acj7-3-EQWM)
* 🎥 [Catalin Miron – Expo Router: Tabs, Stacks, Deep Linking Fix](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmbBzw0rF6w)
* 🎙️ [React Native Radio 327 – Automating App Releases with Pratul Kalia](https://infinite.red/react-native-radio/rnr-327-automating-app-releases-with-pratul-kalia)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [Radon IDE – 已有超过20,000名工程师选择它来获得更流畅的一体化开发体验，现在轮到你了](https://ide.swmansion.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
- 👀 [Expo – React 19.1的`captureOwnerStack`将实现更完善的错误提示](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/35866#issuecomment-2789891297)
- 💬 [React Native RFC – 从react-native中移除深层导入](https://github.com/huntie/react-native-discussions-and-proposals/blob/proposal-deprecate-subpath-imports/proposals/0894-deprecate-subpath-imports.md)：这项变更允许明确定义从包中导出的函数，从而缩小API表面范围。目标是为整个生态系统提供更稳定的API。
- 🐦 [Ben Awad – 分享他在Android平台上减少应用无响应(ANR)错误的实践历程](https://x.com/benawad/status/1908860185113665889)
- ☂️ [协助React Native核心团队用Kotlin重写React Native测试用例](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/50513)：这是参与开源项目的绝佳切入点。
- 📅 [React Native伦敦见面会 – 2025年4月17日](https://guild.host/events/react-native-london-e0q1f1)
- 📜 [理解与比对Expo应用中的指纹信息](https://expo.dev/blog/understanding-and-comparing-fingerprints-in-expo-apps)：通过哈希值比对React Native & Expo应用原生构建版本的变化。
- 📜 [使用EAS工作流和EAS更新将CI时间从20分钟缩短至6分钟](https://shift.infinite.red/cut-ci-from-20-minutes-to-6-with-eas-workflows-and-eas-updates-8d928fe5dcfc)：Infinite Red团队展示如何通过原生构建指纹识别优化CI时长。
- 📜 [使用react-native-track-player在React Native中播放音频](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-04-04/playing-audio-in-react-native/)
- 📜 [Vercel与React Native – 移动开发的新纪元？](https://www.thisdot.co/blog/vercel-and-react-native-a-new-era-of-mobile-development)：关于Vercel可能在React Native领域采取动作的推测。
- 📜 [React Native日志记录指南](https://blog.sentry.io/a-guide-to-logging-in-react-native/)：涵盖控制台日志、原生日志与系统日志。
- 📦 [Builder Bob 0.40发布](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-builder-bob/releases/tag/react-native-builder-bob%400.40.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm – 2025年构建应用的终极方案](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acj7-3-EQWM)
- 🎥 [Catalin Miron – Expo路由：标签页、堆栈导航与深度链接修复](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmbBzw0rF6w)
- 🎙️ [React Native Radio第327期 – 与Pratul Kalia探讨应用发布自动化](https://infinite.red/react-native-radio/rnr-327-automating-app-releases-with-pratul-kalia)

segments.content:
* 👀 [Agenda for the 107th meeting of Ecma TC39](https://github.com/tc39/agendas/blob/main/2025/04.md): Next week the TC39 committee meets again to discuss many new exciting proposals, including Enums, Composites, `export defer`, and more.
* 📜 [Debugging JavaScript Memory Leaks](https://bun.sh/blog/debugging-memory-leaks)
* 📜 [First Look at The Modern CSS `attr()`](https://ishadeed.com/article/modern-attr/)
* 📜 [A Deep Dive into OSI, TCP/UDP, HTTP, and More](https://www.deepintodev.com/blog/how-data-travels-the-world-to-reach-your-screen)
* 📦 [Tailwind CSS 4.1 – Text shadows, masks, and tons more](https://tailwindcss.com/blog/tailwindcss-v4-1)
* 📦 [Rspack 1.3.1 – Run JS loaders in parallel](https://x.com/rspack_dev/status/1907336863096123484)
* 📦 [Turborepo 2.5](https://turbo.build/blog/turbo-2-5)
* 📦 [Rstest – The testing framework powered by Rspack (WIP)](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rstest)
* 📦 [Bun 1.2.9 – Redis client, Node.js compatibility, `require` improvements](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.2.9)
